original_title: The Rant Is Due: Live From Napa
overview: Way back in July 2014, when we were allowed to congregate in large groups, Lewis Black hosted the first live broadcasts of "The Rant Is Due". Transmitted around the Earth via satellite, the show featured town hall-style questions from the audience and submissions from viewers worldwide, all moderated by comedian Kathleen Madigan.  Come time travel to a simpler era, when the big news was that Lebron was returning to the Cavaliers.
title: The Rant Is Due: Live From Napa
